title: Tiger

verbs: To make a loud, deep, hollow noise like the roar of an angry bull.
To make a loud noise in breathing, as horses do when they have a certain disease.
Make a loud noise, as of animal
To make a noise like the deep roar of a large animal.
To make a loud noise, as of animal.
nouns: Sound produced by fast air expansion induced by a lightning.
A loud, deep, prolonged sound, as of a large beast; a roar.
Sudden thunder; a shock of thunder, as opposed to reverberating rumble
Thunder is the sound made by lightning.
A low-pitched, resonant sound, such as of an explosion.
Thunder is the sound caused by lightning.
The sound of the shock wave produced by lightning
The tiger is the largest cat species, reaching a total body length of up to over curves and weighing up to in the wild.
Panthera tigris, the largest cat species
A large carnivorous animal (Panthera tigris) of the cat family indigenous to Asia.
Panthera tigris, a large predatory mammal of the cat family, indigenous to Asia.
Large feline of forests in most of Asia having a tawny coat with black stripes; endangered

description:
A tiger, a large cat with an orange coat and black stripes. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with a long tail, its distinctive stripes, and, on some platforms, white patches.

See also üêØ Tiger Face. Not to be confused with üêÜ Leopard.

One of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac.

Google’s design is noticeably more cartoon-styled, as Facebook’s previously was. Microsoft’s design previously featured a yellow, forward-facing tiger, as if on the prowl.
apple_vendor_description: The tiger emoji on Apple devices is a magnificent creature, its orange and black stripes rendered with a dynamic texture and a subtle sheen that speaks to Apple's realistic lighting.  Its powerful, yet slightly playful expression, combined with the smooth, rounded contours of its form, makes it feel both formidable and approachable.  This emoji on Apple devices often symbolizes strength, courage, wildness, or a fierce spirit, adding a bold and captivating element to digital messages.
